thread.title: Connie Hoyle
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by Connie Hoyle

author: Connie Hoyle
title: Connie Hoyle
text: We did a complete remoldel of our home new sinks ,tubs everything. We put in Peligan salt less water softener, and we have hard water deposits and stains on all our new sinks,tubs, glass . Not so happy. We also installed a RO. It seems to work as promised.
